page.title: 06Holland Sports Club Barton
page.content: The Holland Sports Club is situated by the Fish Pond and is reached by a driveway off Efflinch Lane.The club offers many sports including Cricket, Hockey,Football,Tennis,Table Tennis, Netball and Tug Of War.There are four hard surfaced Tennis courts,two Hockey pitches,a Cricket square and a football pitch.The club actively encourages young people in the village by coaching and running junior Cricket,Hockey, Football and Tennis teams.The buildings comprise of a changing room block and a club house which has a bar run by a steward. Maintenance of the ground and buildings is largely done by volunteer members.
